remarks: Add join to both sides of a lattice ordering.  ( ~ ss2in analog.) (Contributed by NM, 10-Nov-2011.)
statement:
latmle.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
latmle.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
latmle.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
latmlem12 $p |- ( ( K e. Lat /\ ( X e. B /\ Y e. B ) /\ ( Z e. B /\ W e. B ) ) -> ( ( X .<_ Y /\ Z .<_ W ) -> ( X ./\ Z ) .<_ ( Y ./\ W ) ) ) $.
